policies.title: Preparation
policies.body: You receive written summaries within 24 hours so insights are easy to action between fast-paced weeks.

policies.title: Manager involvement
policies.body: If an employer sponsors the programme we agree a light cadence for progress pulses that still protects confidentiality.

policies.title: Payment options
policies.body: Payment plans are available at no additional cost for self-funded clients.

checklist: You are navigating your first or second professional role and want steady accountability.
You are willing to examine habits that lead to overwork or second-guessing.
You can try small experiments between sessions even during busy project cycles.
You want to practise conversations before performance reviews or stakeholder meetings.
You are open to capturing wins so you can advocate for yourself with clarity.
what_to_prepare: Highlights and questions from onboarding, training or recent feedback.
Examples of situations where you felt unsure how to respond or follow up.
Any expectations from managers or mentors that you want to align on.
Ideas for routines or wellbeing rhythms you want to build outside of work.

sections.heading: Confidentiality and ethics
sections.body: All conversations are confidential unless we explicitly agree to share updates with a sponsor or employer. We work to the ICF Code of Ethics and will signpost elsewhere if coaching is not the appropriate support.

sections.heading: Scheduling and cadence
sections.body: Sessions are typically 60 minutes on Zoom. You can reschedule with 24 hours’ notice at no additional cost. Between sessions you can reach out by email or voice note for quick reflections or accountability.

sections.heading: Fees and invoicing
sections.body: Invoices are issued at the start of the engagement with 14-day payment terms unless otherwise agreed. Employer sponsorship is welcomed — we align on confidentiality boundaries before any updates are shared.

sections.heading: Support alongside work
sections.body: If your employer is funding the programme we set up light pulses they can rely on while keeping sessions confidential. You always control what is shared.

sections.heading: Ending or pausing
sections.body: You can pause or end the engagement at any time. We will close with a short retrospective and note any open commitments. Unused sessions are refundable unless a discounted cohort or group rate has been applied.

items.q: Do you offer preparation before performance reviews?
items.a: We rehearse conversations, co-write talking points and identify evidence to bring into the room with confidence.
We agree experiments together so they feel doable alongside your workload. Expect reflection prompts rather than heavy assignments.
Intro chats are usually available within two weeks. Paid sessions start as soon as contracts and invoices are complete.
Most sessions happen online. We regularly support clients across the UK, Europe and Asia-Pacific time zones.
